document.heading: Wayne Place Senior Living Limited Partnership Real Property Tax Exemption Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-290, the “Wayne Place Senior Living Limited Partnership Real Property Tax Exemption Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-505, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 5, 2010, and November 9, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 19, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-611 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-290 became effective on March 8, 2011.
